instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lenis' immediately. Wrap the entire app in a Lenis provider for smooth scrolling. This is non-negotiable for the premium feel.
2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately. Apply 'font-sans' (Manrope) to body and 'font-heading' (Unbounded) to all h1-h6.
3. THEME: Force 'dark' class on the html element. This is a dark-mode-first site. Do not implement a light mode toggle unless explicitly asked later.
4. HERO: Build a 'tsparticles' background with red particles (#E11D2E) moving slowly in a void. Overlay a radial gradient to fade edges to black.
5. CARDS: Use the 'feature' card style defined in components. Add a hover effect where the border color transitions to primary (#E11D2E).
6. TRUST BAR: Use 'react-fast-marquee' with grayscale logos that light up (color) on hover.
7. FORMS: Use Shadcn Form components but style them with the 'inputs.default' styles defined above. No default browser outlines.
8. NAVIGATION: Create a floating glass navbar (fixed top-4 left-4 right-4 rounded-full) with a blur effect.
9. FOOTER: Massive footer. 'AICHIN' text should span the entire width (text-[15vw]) in the footer background.
10. LANGUAGE: Add a simple text toggle (RU / EN) in the navbar. Default to RU if the user browser is RU, else EN.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #050505.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against dark backgrounds.
